outputs.output_descr: Uganda The overall goal of the Pulse-Lab Uganda Programme is to increase Resilience and well-being of Ugandan vulnerable populations to economic and other shocks with appropriate Government interventions and responses.This will be by (a) Increasing Gov'ts ability to anticipate potential shocks (b) Increase the ability Ugandan NGOs and Private Sector to analyse &focus resources based on real time data (c) Increase ability of a global network real time data partners within UN and host countries of Pulse Labs to use real time data for development analysis and response.
